about_the_game:
In the dark corners, there are all kinds of them, which seem to appear suddenly.

Chasing the brilliance and delusionally wanting to be a creature that shines brightly.

The Gate of Radiance is their goal.

And you will command the garrisons of the Gate of Radiance to stop them from approaching.

For you, it doesn't matter if you fail, you have countless chances to fail, and they don't have a chance to succeed.

The gates of radiance have never been opened to them.

In this game, from the very beginning, you have all the cards

And you lose the sense of accomplishment of unlocking cards in the game

The balance of the game is approximately equal to nothing

Who loves to play this game !?

Game content

The game has more than 20 building cards (Light Cards) and more than 100 functional cards (Radiance Cards)

  • Start

At the beginning of the game, you need to choose the difficulty and the building card that will be used in the game.

  • Light door

In the part of the game, the colored rings, you need to stop any monsters from approaching the light door.

Otherwise, if the light door is not durable enough, the game fails.

Building Cards can only be placed inside the light door.

  • Layout Building: Tower

When placing building cards inside a light gate during a match, most buildings will automatically attack the enemy closest to the light door

When you put a building, you need to consume one resource: the light.

The light grows automatically over time. It can also be obtained by laying out some specific buildings or using some Radiance Cards

  • Gacha phase

During the defense, enter the Radiance card gacha round every once in a while,

This draws cards from decks you've built yourself.

At this point, you'll need to choose the Radiance card you want to play to directly enhance your building, or synthesize/buy new cards to build your deck, etc.

  • Victory

Defended until the end of time.
